channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【How Salesforce Used AI To Reduce Test Failure Resolution Time By 30%】Salesforce 如何使用 AI 将测试失败解决时间缩短 30%
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at how Salesforce developed such a system and the key takeaways from their journey.】在本文中，我们将了解 Salesforce 如何开发这样的系统以及他们的旅程的关键要点。

item.title: 【EP184: API Vs SDK! 】EP184：API 与 SDK！
item.description: 【API (Application Programming Interface) and SDK (Software Development Kit) are essential tools in the software development world, but they serve distinct purposes.】API（应用程序编程接口）和 SDK（软件开发工具包）是软件开发领域中必不可少的工具，但它们具有不同的用途。

item.title: 【Domain Name System: The Internet’s Telephone Directory】域名系统：互联网的电话号码簿
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at the journey of a DNS query in detail, the various DNS records, and the role of Anycast in DNS.】在本文中，我们将详细了解 DNS 查询的过程、各种 DNS 记录以及 Anycast 在 DNS 中的作用。

item.title: 【How Facebook’s Distributed Priority Queue Handles Trillions of Items】Facebook 的分布式优先级队列如何处理数万亿个项目
item.description: 【In this article, we look at how FOQS is structured, how it processes enqueues and dequeues, and how it maintains reliability.】在本文中，我们将了解 FOQS 的结构、它如何处理入队和出队以及它如何保持可靠性。

item.title: 【How Flipkart Built a Highly Available MySQL Cluster for 150+ Million Users】Flipkart 如何为 1.5 亿以上用户构建高可用的 MySQL 集群
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at how Altair works under the hood, the technical decisions Flipkart made to balance availability and consistency, and the engineering trade-offs that come with running relational databases at a massive scale.】在本文中，我们将了解 Altair 的幕后工作原理、Flipkart 为平衡可用性和一致性而做出的技术决策，以及大规模运行关系数据库所带来的工程权衡。

item.title: 【How OpenAI Uses Kubernetes And Apache Kafka for GenAI】OpenAI 如何将 Kubernetes 和 Apache Kafka 用于 GenAI
item.description: 【In this article, we will understand how OpenAI built such a system and the challenges they faced.】在这篇文章中，我们将了解 OpenAI 如何构建这样一个系统以及他们面临的挑战。

item.title: 【EP183: MCP vs API: what’s the difference?】EP183：MCP 与 API：有什么区别？
item.description: 【APIs have been the backbone of software-to-software communication for decades.】几十年来，API 一直是软件间通信的支柱。

item.title: 【Last Call: Enrollment for the AI Engineering Cohort Ends Today】最后的呼吁：人工智能工程队列的报名今天结束
item.description: 【Our very first cohort of Becoming an AI Engineer starts in one day. This is a live, cohort-based course created in collaboration with best-selling author Ali Aminian and published by ByteByteGo.】我们的第一批“成为人工智能工程师”课程将在一天内开始。这是一门基于队列的实时课程，由 ByteByteGo 与畅销书作家 Ali Aminian 合作创建。

item.title: 【Service Discovery 101: The Phonebook for Distributed Systems】服务发现 101：分布式系统的电话簿
item.description: 【How do all these services find and communicate with each other in this constantly shifting landscape?】在这个不断变化的环境中，所有这些服务如何相互找到并通信？

item.title: 【How Airbnb Runs Distributed Databases on Kubernetes at Scale】Airbnb 如何在 Kubernetes 上大规模运行分布式数据库
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at how Airbnb implemented this design and the challenges they faced.】在本文中，我们将了解 Airbnb 如何实施这一设计以及他们面临的挑战。
